name: Gun Game (BreadGamerYT)
description: Gun Game is a FREE game where you can join and have fun with friends or randoms! the creator (me) will be on each day to try and entertain you, Gun game is an FPS game where you have to kill your randoms or friends to get a new gun each kill you will be set in a maze made out of boxes, it is a free for all but teaming is allowed!
